script: We're all in Milan, just waiting for you, Editor!
Thank you for the Christmas dinner.
Let's have dinner when you're free.
You should ask me before you look at my phone.
WOMAN: We're best friends. There are no secrets between us.
The Turin-based team came into this match as clear underdogs.
The veteran goalkeeper and captain, Buffon led the team to beat Barcelona for a definitive 3-1 score, making it a perfect ending to Juventus' astonishing season...
As a young reporter covering soccer for five years, I finally watched the Lega Serie A yesterday.
I'd rather try my luck while I'm still young, instead of having a job with no prospects.
I never thought that you would have such ambition.
You know I take it to heart.
Here, I vow to God: One day, I will become a world-famous reporter!
How do you feel right now?
Thank you I AM GOING TO CHASE AFTER MY DREAMS, JUST LIKE YOU DO!
WOMAN: Editor, have you arrived at the airport?
Ma Li, this is not my first Fashion Week.
But this is your first time there as editor-in-chief.
Do you know how busy your schedule is?
I've been prepping in Italy for so many days.
Please don't miss-- MY BEST FRIEND'S WEDDING Editor, we have a fully packed schedule this week.
In addition to the fashion shows, you also have other meetings.
Send me the schedule through WeChat.
A U.K. number, possibly Lin Ran.
Maybe it's a confession of love?
Editor, what about making him your official boyfriend?
Women have fewer options as they get older.
Editor, you've been to Milan with Lin Ran, right?
Wow, we're finally here at the Lega Serie A!
I told you we wouldn't get in without a ticket.
At least we were close to getting in.
It's a pleasure to see you again.
Hello, welcome to the Bulgari Hotel.
These are the photos of the event venue.
Should we add some more decoration?
My head is killing me. I can't think about these things now.
We need to get going or we'll be late.
Well, I should have time to get changed.
MAN: Editor-in-Chief, is your phone working at all?
Wow, it's been a long time.
Editor-in-Chief, I saw in the news you arrived in Milan.
I have something important to tell you. It's important.
Don't tell me you want to leave your job at the BBC to travel the world again.
Yes, the wedding is this weekend.
If you have time, you should come to London.
I understand that you're busy, but we grew up together.
I'm sorry I left last time without saying goodbye.
Here's the plan: I will take care of your flight and hotel.
What am I supposed to do without you?
I can't handle it alone, Editor.
Welcome to British Airways Flight 48 from Milan to London.
Estimated flight time will be two hours.
The weather in London is sunny with an estimated temperature of 22 degrees.
If you need anything during our flight, please contact a member of our team who will be more than happy to assist you.
Well, today must be my lucky day.
You suddenly call and tell me that you're getting married?
So growing up together means nothing to you?
Is this how you treat your best friend?
Did you ever ask if I approve?
Yeah, I probably need some napkins.
Um... Oh, and your drink's finished.
Can I get another champagne, please, as well?
It's fine, it's fine. It's okay.
Hey, do you want my chocolate?
Try reading if you feel so restless.
Tell me if I have done anything wrong.
Why would he marry another girl?
Now can you answer my question?
People say that women with high IQs are usually left on the shelf.
How could you say that to me?
I'm sorry. I'm very, very sorry.
I just can't control my emotions.
Whoa. Let me introduce you. Come on.
Here. This is my fianc√©e, Xuan Xuan.
This is my best friend, Gu Tu Tu.
I know I should call you Ms. Gu.
You can just call me Gu Jia.
I came in such a hurry, I forgot to bring it.
You are such a good friend.
Don't worry. You can try on some of my outfits tomorrow.
As long as you don't mind looking kind of girly.
She's an editor-in-chief in the fashion industry.
She won't have a problem getting pretty dresses.
Right. I can get any outfit with just a phone call.
How about we go to my house first, then drive you to the hotel tonight?
What do you think of my fianc√©e?
She's, like, totally young, totally pretty and, like, totally cute.
Why are you talking like that?
Who says it's only for the Post-'90s?
RAN: Let's open the convertible roof for Gu Jia.
RAN: We'll go to the car first.
A fancy car for an editor-in-chief.
Gu Jia, how do you like the car?
Lin Ran bought it after he got promoted at the BBC.
You think just because you look so fancy now...
I've forgotten how cheap you were back then.
I might have been poor, but I was never cheap.
Did I ever blink an eye when I bought you three hamburgers?
Yeah, but on our trip, who made us share a hotel room to save money?
You slept in the bed, and I slept on the floor.
Had our trip lasted longer, I would've had to pawn all my belongings.
Gu Jia believes that I should always be the one who takes care of the bills.
XUAN: You know, the BBC is promoting him to be a producer in America.
Stop bragging, or I will have no room to improve.
I'll get even better in the future.
Help me out of the car.
You are always in a hurry.
I want to see your new house!
JIA: Small door for such a big house.
I thought your home would be splendid and magnificent.
Turns out, it is quite elegant.
This is the ladies' fitting room. Get out of here.
you look even prettier in person than in the photos he showed me.
You are so young and talented.
I would have fallen in love with you if I were him.
What do you think of this?
No, it's for the best man.
You'd better get a guy to be the best man. Why me?
Lin Ran always said that you were like his sibling, his only family after his parents were gone.
Can you please be his best man?
I know you'll change your mind.
Please. I'm begging you, Gu Jia.
Try it on. Try it on!
I came here to be the bride!
Why are you wearing the veil?
Thanks, Gu Jia, for trying on the veil.
Is there something wrong with the veil?
No, I just wanted to see how I should put it on.
XUAN: So Lin Ran invited his very best friend.
MR. MENG: Who knew that Lin Ran's friend was so pretty.
Xuan Xuan, you'd better be careful.
Dad, Gu Jia is pretty, but what about me?
Did you give birth to her?
You would've never had such a beautiful daughter if it weren't for me. Can you give birth to a baby? Then show us.
My only friend is on my left.
He's one of the top students at Cambridge.
Has three Ph.D.s and two Masters.
That one, not good-looking, but he's rich.
He's got an annual salary of¬£3 million! Impressive.
It's not possible for everyone to be as handsome as I am.
For a strong woman like you, finding a partner is difficult.
You should hurry up while you are still young.
I'm sincerely thankful for your concern.
I think I'm still in good shape.
We've been so busy preparing for the wedding, arguing over who to invite, that we almost called it off.
Let me know if you need anything in London.
You know how busy we are.
See you at the cake shop tomorrow.
I thought that you would quit school and start working .after your parents passed away.
But you stayed, and now you're graduating.
I have finally fulfilled my parents' last wish.
When I get a real job and save some money, I will go travel the world.
There is an old saying: Start your family before your career.
But I want more candy inside.
Gu Jia, my head is going to explode.
Hi, Bill. Do we have peanuts in this cake?
Try this. Give me one minute, and I'll give you the world.
Hey, Bill. Remember my fianc√©e cannot have peanuts.
Look at the way he eats.
Lin Ran always says what he likes most is my silliness.
XUAN: He loves me so much and always takes care of me.
RAN: Remember, my fianc√©e cannot have peanuts.
RAN: My fianc√©e cannot have peanuts.
She can take care of it.
So, Associate Producer at the BBC, your dream finally came true.
So you're going to live in London?
No wonder you look so hot right now.
You never approve of my choices.
You changed yourself for someone else.
When you are really in love, nothing else really matters.
I've been adrift for so long.
Now I finally have somewhere to settle down.
Have you ever been on a double-decker bus?
Do you want to have a try?
I haven't been on one for years.
Do you remember that summer in Milan?
You said we would travel all around Italy on a Vespa.
It's so easy to make you happy.
It's been so long since we've spent time together.
I've been in London for days.
Is this how you take care of your guests?
I'll take you wherever you want.
MA LI: Editor, we need you back now!
Lots of things are pending your confirmation.
I'm still working on something more important than Fashion Week.
Send me my luggage as soon as possible.
I forgot to tell you: You are now promoted to editor-in-chief.
So, what did you ask me out for?
I asked you out to go shopping with me.
Yesterday, my mom asked if I was sure I wanted to marry Lin Ran.
Then my dad said if I do marry him, maybe he should resign from the BBC and take over my father's company.
But when I turned around, Lin Ran was standing right behind me.
Then he stormed out in a rage.
I didn't even have a chance to explain.
Gu Jia, what should I do so he will forgive me?
I have never seen him so angry before, like he would leave me at any moment.
Honestly, I think you are still quite young.
Are you sure you want to get married this early?
Gu Jia, he's been mad for two days over what my parents said.
What's worse, my ex-boyfriend texted me and he saw it.
What if he refuses to marry me?
You should just tell him: If you're gonna get mad when others try to be nice to you, why should we stay together?
Wouldn't he get even angrier if I say that?
Just listen to me and tell him what I said.
I'll listen to you, Gu Jia.
Those shoes look amazing on you.
Let me buy them for you.
It is my pleasure to make you a present.
MA LI: I've heard that Karl's cats make several million euros.
She's good friends with the big boss.
If she sees you, then everyone will know you aren't in Milan.
Send me my luggage right away.
Hi, Christian, good to see you.
My parents just want what's best for us.
You know, if you're going to get mad when others try to be nice to you, why should we stay together?
But Lin Ran just got even angrier.
Now he wants to cancel the wedding!
The rich think about nothing but money.
It's natural that you have different values.
Is that what she said to you?
Do me a favor and tell her she needs to understand: I am who I am.
I am marrying her, not her family.
So, what should I do now?
You should know by now how he handles things.
Maybe just leave him alone for a while.
Can you ask him to not be left alone too long?
Okay, I will talk to him again.
She said: The ceremony is soon, friends and family are all coming.
Don't make your own life difficult-- Cancel the wedding!
Actually, the first time I saw you two, I felt like you were from different worlds.
She lives in a luxurious house and grew up like a princess.
You don't think that becoming an Associate Producer at the BBC and driving a convertible can give her security?
Do you know what she wants?
Wait, what did you just say?
Now I can't help loving you more than ever.
Lin Ran is very lucky to have such a great friend.
You know, we've already talked it over.
We will speak to my parents together.
He is not good at doing business.
I won't force him to do anything.
As long as he is by my side, I have security.
It's good that you figured it out.
Otherwise, he might have started traveling again and left you alone.
Gu Jia, I can't help loving you more than ever.
I like standup comedy as much as the next man, but that guy was no good.
I mean, he opened with a-- Hello.
That's the girl from the plane.
Don't let her see me here.
I shouldn't worry just because she's an adult?
You haven't heard from the hotel? Where would she go?
What worries me is that she took my car.
She doesn't even know which side to drive on.
What if she's in an accident and someone gets hurt?
WOMAN 1: After all the years we spent together.
I've been there for you, I've supported you.
How could you do this to me?
I thought we were going to spend the rest of our lives together.
No. I'm sorry, he belongs to me now.
You don't know how much I love you.
If you want, I can change.
I can change, and be a sweet girl, a cute girl.
If I do that, would you please-- Sorry, guys. I'm so sorry.
Why do you have Gu Jia's phone?
I'll tell her to call you back when she wakes up. Bye.
I know everything about you guys since you were 3.
when he was on the phone just now...
I was looking for you all night!
If something happened to you, how could I get married?
I'm just a bridesmaid, not the bride! Why are you so mad?
You don't know how worried he was last night.
Okay, why don't we go inside.
You didn't tell me you were getting married either.
Why can't I have a boyfriend?
You got drunk and didn't come back last night.
Now all of a sudden you have a boyfriend?
Hey, that's not a big deal nowadays, right?
Hey, Lin Ran is going to go play soccer with the guys.
You should invite Nick to join them.
When did you meet Gu Jia?
We met a few days ago on the flight to London.
I think our game is working.
You see the way he's looking at you?
Do you want to take it to another level?
Excuse me, ladies and gentlemen, sorry to interrupt.
The love between Lin Ran and Xuan Xuan has touched me deeply.
So please allow me to make a toast and dedicate a song to the goddess of my heart: Gu Jia.
CHOIR: Gu Jia, I've always dreamed of having my wedding in a cathedral.
Just like a prince and princess.
Baby, no matter where the wedding is, you are always my princess.
By the way, Gu Jia, I can book this place for your and Nick's wedding, too.
Baby, I don't think they're getting married anytime soon.
We both like to keep things simple.
But for the wedding, it has to be a romantic location.
Gu Jia, we need to talk.
You're already talking marriage after knowing him a few days?
Aren't you getting a little carried away?
And you want to marry him?
I won't be around to comfort you if he breaks your heart.
Why don't you just take her away from me.
You've known each other for a few days.
Do you know how long I've known her?
Let's stop making fun of him.
Actually, she's not my cup of tea.
Gu Jia told me how you worry that she doesn't have a boyfriend.
You two have gone too far.
I'm just afraid that-- What's up, man?
What? So you don't like people like me?
May I have a word with you?
I hope it wasn't too much.
You're wasting too much time on this.
I told you he still loves you.
What you need to do is find an opportunity to tell him that you love him.
I'd be crazy to tell him that I love him now!
What do I do if he says no?
How do you know if you don't try?
I wish we could go back to the old days.
RAN: Do you remember I told you that I wanted to travel around the world?
And you wanted me to go with you.
You're lucky that you didn't follow me.
I lost interest in everything by the end.
I even thought about jumping in the river.
The way you talk is still so dramatic.
I think of myself as a firefly.
At least I still have that little light on my butt.
You wanted to light up the whole world.
But I lost that last bit of light later on.
And I became no better than a fly.
I'm not like you. You work like you have a motor inside you.
Of course. I try my best and I go for it!
She supports me, no matter what I do.
I want to be a better man and protect her.
I need to be protected too.
I should have given you more support.
Ever since my parents passed away, you've always been by my side.
This may be the last time we get to spend time alone.
Not even for a cup of coffee?
You can choose not to sign.
I love her and only her.
She always says, if you love someone, you need to shout it out loud, or-- You might lose your chance.
You still haven't spoken your heart?
Just find a way to postpone the wedding.
I must get the special discount.
Lin Ran's wedding at the cathedral tomorrow?
Editor, are you finally pursuing your own happiness?
Editor, we don't need to confirm the event.
Where can I find Gu Jia?
Hey, can you stop pacing back and forth like that?
Every girl has a dream wedding in mind, right?
I must give her the best.
My girl has to be the happiest in the world.
Stay away from the platform edge.
I must think of a solution.
She's always dreamt of a wedding in a cathedral.
I can't even make that happen.
You always give her whatever she wants!
If she truly wants to marry you, does the location really matter?
Aren't you coming in with me?
I'll be there in a minute.
Ma Li, I told you to postpone the wedding.
MA LI: What? What was canceled?
Editor, I forgot to tell you that I couldn't reach them.
Editor, it's probably meant to be.
Editor, you must take this chance.
Yeah, we're looking for another wedding venue.
As long as you are happy, I can do anything.
I will listen to you regarding all family matters.
I told Xuan Xuan about the cancellation.
I guess I got worried over nothing.
She said that the location isn't important.
What's important is that we're together.
RAN: It's so easy to make you happy.
JIA: I came here to be the bride!
How do you know if you don't try?
There should be more roses at the wedding venue.
I think I found a place for the wedding.
Relax, I got her the best hairdresser and makeup artist.
By the way, you aren't allowed to see the bride before the ceremony.
If you really want to thank me, take a walk with me.
Lin Ran, I need to tell you-- Tu Tu.
Before you say anything, I'd like to ask you something.
Did you ask Nick to cancel the wedding at the cathedral?
I heard back from the cathedral.
They said someone named Nick canceled it.
I didn't ask him to do anything!
Why did you ask him to cancel my wedding?
You're my best friend, the most important person in the world to me.
I invited you to my wedding, hoping to share my happiness.
I remember it was exactly here where you asked me if I could give you a chance and be with you.
I want to say yes now.
If the wedding must go on, I wish I could be the bride.
If you also want to be with me...
I can be the bad guy and explain everything to the guests.
I need to protect someone else now.
Don't come any closer, or I'll throw myself against the wall!
I can be the bride if you're dead.
You are in love with Lin Ran!
The whole world knows, except you.
You tricked us into coming here to try to win him back.
I'm telling you that is not gonna happen!
I have been trying to get him back Because I never thought he would leave me one day.
You know, I really disliked you the first day we met.
You were so cute and innocent.
But in Lin Ran's eyes, you are precious.
He would do anything to protect you.
To him, I will always be his best friend.
You will regret it, as I do, if you don't go back now.
And now I pronounce you husband and wife.
You will find your own happiness.
